prompts: Create a legendary water-type Pokemon with a sleek blue body and white fins.
Imagine a mythical creature that can control the ocean, featuring vibrant blue and red patterns.
Generate a large aquatic Pokemon that resembles a whale, with distinct markings and powerful fins.
Show me a powerful water-type Pokemon with an elegant design and a fierce expression.
Design a blue sea creature Pokemon that has the ability to summon storms and waves.
Give me a detailed description of a legendary Pokemon that thrives in the ocean depths.
Make a Pokemon with a majestic appearance and unique features that hint at its water-type abilities.
